DOC.brief_summary: Study to investigate the safety and efficacy of Alesion速 Dry Syrup under the proper use in daily clinical practice in Japanese paediatric patients with urticaria
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate the Safety and Efficacy of Alesion速 in Japanese Paediatric Patients With Urticaria
DOC.criteria: All the patients who: haven't treatment experience of epinastine product entered the survey; have urticaria Alesion速 Dry Syrup is contraindicated for the patients with history of hypersensitivity to any ingredients of Alesion速 Dry Syrup in package insert. However, it was unknown whether a patient is hypersensitive to the ingredients of the product in almost cases. And this survey was drug utilization study to observe actual use in any patients. Therefore exclusion criteria are not set in the protocol
